header.title: Services
header.subtitle: Professional development services tailored to your needs

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Custom websites and web applications built with modern technologies

cta.heading: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.text: Let's discuss how I can help bring your ideas to life

faq.question: What's your typical turnaround time?
faq.answer: Most projects take 2-4 weeks depending on complexity. Rush delivery is available for an additional fee.

faq.question: Do you offer maintenance and support?
faq.answer: Yes! I offer ongoing maintenance packages to keep your project running smoothly and up-to-date.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: I accept bank transfers, PayPal, and most major credit cards. Payment terms are typically 50% upfront, 50% on completion.
